content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


For each domain enumerated in scope attempt to access the lync discovery subdomain to identify potential Active Directory domains.

Variation: Manual Review


1. For each domain enumerated in scope attempt to access the lync discovery subdomain to identify potential Active Directory domains.

Example:


https://lyncdiscover.domain.com/


Reporting Requirements


Report the ADS domains in the task notes or add to Artifacts.
